(:action make ; Create a structure or gather resources
  :parameters (?location - location ?container - container ?materials - object ?resource - object)
  :precondition (and
                  (at ?location)
                  (empty ?container)
                  (available ?materials)
                  (available ?resource))
  :effect (and
            (constructed ?location ?container ?materials ?resource)
            (not (empty ?container))

(:action boil ; Boil water using available resources
    :parameters (?resource - resource ?source - source ?container - container ?tool - tool)
    :precondition (and
                    (at ?resource ?source)
                    (available ?tool)
                    (empty ?container))
    :effect (and
              (boiled_water ?container)
              (not (empty ?container))

(:action navigate ; Navigate to a resource and update status
    :parameters (?entity - entity ?resource - resource)
    :precondition (and 
                    (not (at_resource ?entity ?resource))
                    (known_resource ?entity ?resource)
                   )
    :effect (and
              (at_resource ?entity ?resource)
              (status_updated ?entity ?resource)
            )

(:action purify ; Transform an entity's state from impure/uncrafted to pure/crafted
    :parameters (?entity - object ?resource1 - object ?resource2 - object)
    :precondition (and
                    (resource1_available ?resource1)
                    (resource2_available ?resource2)
                    (not (entity_purified ?entity))
                  )
    :effect (entity_purified ?entity)
)

(:action craft ; Craft a new item or collect resources and update the status
    :parameters (?entity1 - object ?entity2 - object)
    :precondition (and
                    (found ?entity1)
                    (found ?entity2)
                    (not (crafted ?entity1 ?entity2))
                  )
    :effect (crafted ?entity1 ?entity2)
)
